song.title: Trust and Obey
song.lyrics:
[1] When we walk with the Lord in the light of his word, what a glory he sheds on our way! While we do his good will, he abides with us still, and with all who will trust and obey.
[C] Refrain: Trust and obey, for there's no other way to be happy in Jesus, but to trust and obey.
[2] Not a burden we bear, not a sorrow we share, but our toil he doth richly repay; not a grief or a loss, not a frown or a cross, but is blest if we trust and obey. [B] [Refrain]
[3] But we never can prove the delights of his love until all on the altar we lay; for the favor he shows, for the joy he bestows, are for them who will trust and obey. [B] [Refrain]
[4] Then in fellowship sweet we will sit at his feet, or we'll walk by his side in the way; what he says we will do, where he sends we will go; never fear, only trust and obey. [B] [Refrain]
